From what we discussed on nbw online, the Guardians are leftover 
troops from the first Beast Wars. They were twitched a bit by 
outworldly powers and now act to preserve the planet. They can be 
part of any group, but they are like brothers in their cause. Of 
course, details can still be adjusted. Say your word!

You could use your character, provided the background fits the jobs.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> What exactly are you looking for?  Can I use a character I have 
created for a similar purpose?
> 
> Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:We're currently making a few new 
characters that will be able to 
> stand up agaisnt Unicron. We would like to encourage the new 
players 
> to take part in that little clique. 
> 
> If you're interested, please tell us on NBW_online.
>
